text.div:
Chikungunya Virus Disease (Tests for Chikungunya Virus Antibody [Quantitative])

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    40505-0 Chikungunya virus Ab [Titer] in Serum by Hemagglutination inhibition
    43064-5 Chikungunya virus Ab [Titer] in Serum
    56128-2 Chikungunya virus IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence
    56130-8 Chikungunya virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence
    83067-9 Chikungunya virus structural proteins (E1+E2) IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    83068-7 Chikungunya virus structural proteins (E1+E2) IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
